name: globalSettings
label: Global Settings
tooltip: These are settings that generally apply to the entire App.

subSchema.name: pluginLoadSettings
subSchema.label: Plugins
subSchema.description: Select the Plugins you'd like to load at the startup of the App! These may perform operations on data, the way the App renders, or supply additional Settings! You can use built-in Plugins, or supply your own!

subSchema.name: pluginSettings
subSchema.label: Built-In Plugins
subSchema.description: Select a set of Built-In Plugins to load at startup! Warning: Certain Plugins can override functionality and cause conflicts or errors, so be sure they're compatible!

subSchema.name: customPlugins
subSchema.label: Custom Plugins
subSchema.description:
Enter a direct URL to a Plugin JS file, or a folder to autoload index.js.
Example: https://mywebsite.com/pluginFolder/myPlugin.js
